org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.store

Class OnlineBackup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.store.OnlineBackup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OnlineBackup
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class provides functionalty for tests to perform online backup in a separate thread. And functions to create/restore/rollforard recovery from the backup.
    Version:
    1.0
